item.title: Measuring Financial Health
item.description:
Can new measurement concepts improve our understanding of how financial systems are contributing to people's well-being? Here are some resources I've developed to explore the role and utility of financial health as a measurement concept to complement measures of access and usage of financial services:

  1. Building a better compass: creating financial inclusion measures that are allied with people and their well-being, Part 1

  2. Building a better compass: creating financial inclusion measures that are allied with people and their well-being, Part 2

  3. Discussion of Gallup's Financial Health survey findings in Kenya
